import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin', templateUrl: './admin.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin.component.scss'], }) export class AdminComponent implements OnInit { public data = null; constructor(private activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.data = this.activatedRoute.snapshot.data['list']; console.log(this.data); } }
